meanings.sent1: The newly incorporated company held its first board meeting.
meanings.sent2: The law firm was an incorporated entity, providing legal services to clients.
meanings.sent3: The incorporated team of superheroes fought crime in the city.
meanings.sent4: Her mind incorporated all the knowledge she had gained over the years.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece incorporated various colors and textures.

meanings.definition: Combined or included as part of a whole
meanings.sent1: The cake recipe incorporated both chocolate and vanilla flavors.
meanings.sent2: The new design incorporated feedback from all team members.
meanings.sent3: The incorporated ingredients created a delicious and unique dish.
meanings.sent4: His speech incorporated elements of humor to engage the audience.
meanings.sent5: The garden design incorporated a mix of flowers and shrubs for a vibrant look.

meanings.definition: United or merged into a single entity
meanings.sent1: The two companies became incorporated after the merger.
meanings.sent2: The diverse cultures in the city were incorporated into a harmonious community.
meanings.sent3: The incorporated families celebrated the holiday together.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship incorporated trust and mutual respect.
meanings.sent5: The music festival incorporated various genres to appeal to a wide audience.
